titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 3/20/2012--Passed House without amendment. Elects specified named Members to the following House Committees: (1) Education and the Workforce, and (2) Energy and Commerce.
